title: Beauchamp: Pronounced “Rip-off”
content:
Well well, what do we have here? I was clearing out my downloads folder and came a pdf specimen from [Australian Faces.](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123094936/http:/www.australianfaces.com/) (To download, click on the Beauchamp link under the 'new' heading)

It looks surprisingly like the wonderful Mantinia from [The Font Bureau](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123094936/http:/www.fontbureau.com/), with a badly modified B and G. Ugh. Perhaps it is accidental, a freak of nature where the Aussies have managed to design a frighteningly similar typeface?
author: kris

comments.content: Probably not legit, especially when you take into account the other copies at that site. Deftone is a [Larabie](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123094936/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/larabie/deftone/) font. UntitledAF is [Solaris](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123094936/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=verity.search&searchstr=solaris). Old Chicago is just the old Mac system font run through a filter.

that description of "old chicago" is hilarious...

w|m
